author: Mark Berman, Marisa Iati, Abigail Hauslohner, Keith McMillan, Holly Bailey, Hannah Knowles, Meryl Kornfield, Mark Guarino, Timothy Bella
title: Two officers shot, suspect in custody amid night of unrest after grand jury decision on Breonna Taylor case - The Washington Post
description: Louisville police fatally shot Breonna Taylor, a 26-year-old Black woman, at her apartment in March. Taylor’s name has become a rallying cry for policing overhauls and racial justice nationwide.
content: At least four protest marches proceeded peacefully throughout Chicago early Wednesday evening as hundreds of people seized upon the news that no Louisville police were indicted in the killing of Breo… [+2206 chars]

title: Microsoft is releasing a non-subscription Office suite in 2021 - Engadget
description: The company has been pushing Microsoft 365 for years now as the main way to get its Office apps.
content: In a blog post announcing the next version of its Exchange Server, Microsoft has slipped in a single line that’s bound to make those who hate paying subscription fees for Office apps happy. “Microsof… [+683 chars]
